dct_title_s: Bernard now Bernards Township, New Jersey 1873
dct_description_sm: Map of northern Somerset County, N.J. showing old Bedminster and Bernards Townships, encompassing what is now Bedminster, Bernards Township and Bernardsville, Far Hills and Peapack-Gladstone Boroughs. Printed in 1968 from an original 1873 map in the Atlas of Somerset County, N.J. created by Beers, Comstock and Cline. Includes section of N. J. West railroad line.
